q: La Jolla.(858) 454-9176 or comedystorelajolla.com Owned and operated by Mitzi Shore , this La Jolla club has hosted everyone from Cheech and Chong and David Letterman to Robin Williams and Howie Mandel . Schedule: Wednesdays and Thursdays feature Best of San Diego and Hollywood comedians: 15 comics each do about 10 minutes of stand-up from 8 to 10:30 p.m. Admission is$ 8 with a two-drink minimum( the drinks don't have to be alcoholic).
